title: USA TODAY Partners with Brand Film Festival for This Year's Top Viral Film
text:
CLOSE

USA TODAY and Brand Film Festival partner to for audience award (Photo: USA TODAY)

Today, USA TODAY launched a poll for its audience to choose their favorite viral film of the year in a partnership with Brand Film Festival.

Beginning today and running, through Friday, April 13th, readers can watch three submitted brand films and choose their favorite to be awarded USA TODAY’s Audience Award for Top Viral Film.

Brand Film Festival, in its third year, showcases the most artistic, creative and effective branded content films, from YouTube videos to long-form documentaries. The event brings together and honors marketing storytellers, while rewarding the brands, agencies, and those leading the way in their fields.

The short list provided to USA TODAY received high scores by its jury, which is comprised of top creatives from the worlds of advertising, digital, production, PR, films, and media. The 2018 Brand Film Festival jury chair is CEO of CAA Marketing, a Stagwell Media and CAA Company, Jae Goodman.

The winner will be announced on May 3rd at the Brand Film Festival in New York City.
